channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cloud Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cloud Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-41747|2024-09-26T20:48:35.056Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cloud%20manager
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to unauthenticated path traversal. The following products are affected: Acronis Cloud Manager (Windows) before build 6.2.23089.203.

item.title: CVE-2024-34012|2024-06-14T15:26:59.709Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cloud%20manager
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to insecure folder permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Cloud Manager (Windows) before build 6.2.24135.272.

item.description: Local privilege escalation due to insecure folder permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Cloud Manager (Windows) before build 6.2.24135.272.
